tool_contract.description:
Mapping PacBio sequences to references using an algorithm selected from a
selection of supported command-line alignment algorithms. Input can be a
fasta, pls.h5, bas.h5 or ccs.h5 file or a fofn (file of file names). Output
can be in SAM or BAM format. If output is BAM format, aligner can
only be blasr and QVs will be loaded automatically.

NOTE that pbalign no longer supports CMP.H5 in 3.0.

schema_options.name: Align unsplit polymerase reads
schema_options.description:
Do not split reads into subreads even if subread 
regions are available.

schema_options.name: Concordant alignment
schema_options.description: Map subreads of a ZMW to the same genomic location

schema_options.name: Algorithm options
schema_options.description: List of space-separated arguments passed to BLASR

schema_options.name: Hit policy
schema_options.description:
Specify a policy for how to treat multiple hit
  random    : selects a random hit.
  all       : selects all hits.
  allbest   : selects all the best score hits.
  randombest: selects a random hit from all best score hits.
  leftmost  : selects a hit which has the best score and the
              smallest mapping coordinate in any reference.

tool_contract.name: pbalign.tasks.pbalign
